name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in Java, J2EE, and Spring Boot development, proficiently utilizing **GitHub**, **Maven**, and **Jenkins** for version control and CI/CD automation. My robust knowledge extends to building RESTful and SOAP web services and employing **Hibernate** for ORM solutions, ensuring seamless data interaction with **RDBMS** systems including **MySQL**, **Oracle**, **SQL Server**, and **PostgreSQL**. I am well-versed in writing unit tests using **JUnit** and **Cucumber**, and have hands-on experience with automated testing frameworks like **Selenium**. 
In addition to my core Java expertise, I have a strong background in full-stack development with modern technologies including **React** and **Vue.js**, as well as experience in cloud environments like **AWS**. I have led the scaling of enterprise platforms by integrating AI/ML capabilities using tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**. I focus on building secure and compliant applications aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, supported by expertise in microservices architecture and event-driven systems.
